full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffrey DATE: 2/28/05 TIME: 12:44 P.M. M: Darren OF: PHONE/MOBILE: TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: He needs to speak with you SIGNED: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffrey DATE: 2/28/05 TIME: 12:10 P.M. M: Lawrence Krocuss OF: PHONE/MOBILE: 216 370 3496 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: He has sent you some faxes that he would like follow up. SIGNED: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffrey DATE: 2/28/05 TIME: 5:30 P.M. M: Christine OF: PHONE/MOBILE: TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: He called SIGNED: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffrey DATE: 2/27/05 TIME: 11:20 A.M. M: Sarah OF: PHONE/MOBILE: TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: Please call her back. She wants to make sure you know that she is going to meet Christine and go with her to the Ranch SIGNED: Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032551

text_blocks.content: He needs to speak with you
He has sent you some faxes that he would like follow up.
Please call her back. She wants to make sure you know that she is going to meet Christine and go with her to the Ranch

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a notepad page with four 'IMPORTANT MESSAGE' forms filled out. The forms contain handwritten notes and messages from various individuals to Jeffrey. The document is part of a public records request.
